titleStmt.title: The citye match A comoedye. Presented to the King and Queene at White-hall. Acted since at Black-friers by His Maiesties Servants.
titleStmt.author: Mayne, Jasper, 1604-1672.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Leonard Lichfield, printer to the University,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The citie match.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
